Chords and Strumming
'The Climb'-Miley Cyrus "how to cover".....I did this as a sort of joke...kinda like 
evil alter ego...but also to get the chords down for anyone interested....I embarrassed 
so you don't have to !! (LOL)....Still let me see your versions when you put them 
up...hit me with a link.
The song is basically all there:

[ch]E[/ch]   = [ch]E[/ch] (with pinky)
[ch]A[/ch]   = 5th 'E-barre' (dot)
[ch]F#m[/ch] = 2nd 'E-barre (no middle finger)
[ch]C#m[/ch] = 9th (dot) 'E-barre' (no middle finger)
[ch]G#m[/ch] = 4th 'E-barre' (no middle finger)

Strumming pattern is basically simple in the first slow part. you can either play 
half-down, D, U or you can play the chord notes individually (like a piano would). 
a pretty easy song either way (good practice for your pinky using the 'E-movable barre chords"

[ch]F#m[/ch] = 2nd 'E-barre' (no middle finger)

[ch]B[/ch]   = 7th (dot) 'E-barre'

...Have fun with it! check out my other videos, too. If you have a suggestion or 
me know!

Enjoy
